english: The suggestion of his fell upon deaf ears .
chinese: 他的这项建议没有人理睬。

english: The trouble was: no one would believe her .
chinese: 问题在于没有人会相信她。

english: No one makes singing stocks from a big log .
chinese: 没有人用大圆木做击棒啊。

english: No one could know why he did like that .
chinese: 没有人知道他这样做的缘故。

english: The breath of slander never touched him .
chinese: 从来没有人对他造谣中伤。
没有人造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Nobody heeded me, nobody was aware of me .
chinese: 没有人关心我，没有人注意我。

english: Nobody dared lift their eyes from the ground .
chinese: 没有人敢把视线离开地面。

english: Nobody thought he would last 15 rounds .
chinese: 没有人认为他会坚持15圈。

english: None could witness that he was present .
chinese: 没有人能证明他是在场的。

english: Don't barge in where you are not wanted .
Nobody asked your opinion so butt out .
chinese: 没有人征求你的意见，请你别多嘴。

english: I rang and no one came to the door .
chinese: 我揿揿门铃，没有人来开门。

english: Not a soul remained within the enclosure .
No human beings live there permanently .
chinese: 没有人在这里长期居住。

english: His brilliance was allowed by all .
chinese: 没有人不承认他的才华过人。
